enter_email_password: Please enter both email and password.
welcomeIntro: A warm welcome to CK Farm! We are happy to tell you that you are part of this revolution in the field of animal husbandry and the dairy business. By using our online platform, you can expand your network, gain valuable insights into new market products, and sell your animals at the right price, all from the comfort of your home.
agenda: Our sole agenda is to create a significant transformation in the field of animal husbandry and the dairy industry.
termsInstruction: To enjoy the benefits of this application, please follow these Terms and Conditions:
userAgreementDetail: By using CK Farm, you agree to enter and utilize the platform responsibly. When advertising animals, you commit to providing true and accurate information. You are solely responsible for the information you submit.
platformPurposeDetail: The primary purpose of the CK Farm application is to enable users to post advertisements for selling animals. The platform is designed to connect buyers and sellers but does not act as an intermediary in the transaction process.
animalBehaviorDetail: Once you express interest in an animal, you are encouraged to personally verify the animal's behavior and condition before making any decisions. Do not make any advance payments before seeing the animal in person and ensuring its suitability.
postTransactionDetail: After a transaction is completed, you are solely responsible for handling and managing the purchased animal. Ck Goat Farm is not responsible for any misbehavior or issues with the animal after the sale has taken place.
governingLawDetail: These terms are governed by the laws of India.
pry_welcomeIntro: A warm welcome to CK Farm! We are happy to tell you that you are part of this revolution in the field of animal husbandry and the dairy business. By using our online platform, you can expand your network, gain valuable insights into new market products, and sell your animals at the right price, all from the comfort of your home.
pry_privacyGoal: Our primary goal is to foster a significant transformation in the field of animal husbandry and the dairy industry. As you join this movement, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a secure environment for your interactions on the platform.
pry_introductionDetail: This Privacy Policy explains how Ck Goat Farm ('we,' 'our,' or 'us') collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use the CK Farm application.
pry_personalInfo: Personal Information: We collect personal information such as your name, contact details (email, phone number), location (city, state), and other profile details when you post ads or register for the forum.
pry_nonPersonalInfo: Non-personal Information: We may collect information such as your browser type, device information, and usage data to improve the platformâ€™s experience.
pry_usageDetails: To enable you to post and view ads, as well as engage in buying and selling animals through the platform. To facilitate communication between buyers and sellers. To allow participation in forum discussions related to animal husbandry and dairy business. To enhance platform functionality and improve the user experience. To send you relevant updates or notifications regarding the services provided by CK Farm.
pry_sharingDetails: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to protect the safety and security of users. Your contact details may be shared with other users during a transaction (e.g., between buyers and sellers).
pry_securityDetails: We use reasonable measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the internet is entirely secure, so users share their information at their own risk.
pry_responsibilityDetails: You are responsible for the accuracy of the information you provide when posting ads or engaging with other users on the platform. Misleading or false information can lead to account suspension.
pry_cookiesDetails: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on the platform, analyze user behavior, and provide targeted content. You can manage cookie settings in your browser.
pry_rightsDetails: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data at any time. If you wish to exercise your rights, you may contact us using the information below.
pry_changesDetails: We may revise this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Any significant changes will be communicated through the app.
pry_contactDetails: For any questions about this Privacy Policy or to exercise your data rights, please contact us at ckgoatfarmapp@gmail.com.
scd_upload_image: Please upload at least one image
delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete this animal?
delete_failed: Failed to delete animal. Try again later.
sold_failed: Failed to mark animal as sold. Try again later.
